	allowSchemaDrift: true,

ADSL Source Confirmed US unpivot(output(
		DayDate as date,
		Amount as string
	),
	ungroupBy(UID,
		iso2,
		iso3,
		code3,
		FIPS,
		Admin2,
		Province_State,
		Country_Region,
		Lat,
		Long_,
		Combined_Key),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Unpivot Confirmed US
Unpivot Confirmed US sink(input(
